SurfaceÔÉÅ

class pyrit.geometry.Surface(ext_curves: List[Curve], *int_curves: List[Curve], physical_tag: Optional[int] = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: PrimitiveGeo

A class representing a surface.

Construct an instance of Surface.

Parameters

  • ext_curves (List[Curve]) ‚Äì External curves.

  • *int_curves (List[Curve]) ‚Äì Internal curves. For each hole in the surface a list of curves that define the hole.

  • physical_tag (int, optional) ‚Äì The physical tag of the surface. The default is None.

Methods

add_to_gmsh

Add the surface to gmsh.

remove

Remove the Surface from GMSH.

reset_tag

Sets its own tag and the tags of all contained entities to None.

rotate

Rotate the Surface.

translate

Translate the Surface.

Attributes

added

Check if the surface is already added to gmsh.

curves

Return a list of all curves.

dim

Get the dimension of the surface.

ext_curves

Get ext_curves.

has_holes

Get has_holes.

int_curves

Get int_curves.

num_curves

The number of curves.

physical_tag

tag

add_to_gmsh()ÔÉÅ

Add the surface to gmsh.

Raises

Warning ‚Äì When an object of class curve is part of the surface.

Return type

None.

remove(recursive=True)ÔÉÅ

Remove the Surface from GMSH.

Return type

None.

translate(dx: float, dy: float, dz: float)ÔÉÅ

Translate the Surface.

Parameters

  • dx (float) ‚Äì Translation in x-direction

  • dy (float) ‚Äì Translation in y-direction

  • dz (float) ‚Äì Translation in z-direction

Return type

None.

rotate(angle_x: float, angle_y: float, angle_z: float, rotation_origin: ndarray = array([0, 0, 0]))ÔÉÅ

Rotate the Surface.

Note the order of the rotation: first x-axis, second y-axis, third around z-axis.

Parameters

  • angle_x (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around x-axis in radian

  • angle_y (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around y-axis in radian

  • angle_z (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around z-axis in radian

  • rotation_origin (np.ndarray, optional) ‚Äì The origin around which is rotated. By default (0,0,0) is used.

Return type

None.

reset_tag() → NoneÔÉÅ

Sets its own tag and the tags of all contained entities to None.

Return type

None
